overview: The movie story is about a girl (Beesa) who works as a singer in a night club, and loves a thief (Antar) who is out of prison with his colleagues (Fawwar) and (Hindi), who fail to steal a car, but kidnap a girl for ransom, and fail in that too. Antar and Bessa like the kidnapped girl and supports her at the end, when Antar and Bessa get married.
title: Antar & Beesa
